title: One more ID for today please
content:
Looking for an ID on the font used in eg 'the world's bogey man' please

Many thanks

Steve

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074346/http:/typophile.com/files/image_48.jpg) | 116.83 KB |
author: Kilgore Trout 23

comments.content:
You could try **[Cheltenham Extra Bold COndesnsed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074346/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Cheltenhm%20XBdCn%20BT%20-%20Bold&fid=d68217b66deacee5cec9ff14f9191b6a&fsize=48&text=THE%20WORLDS%20BOGEY%20MAN%20LOCAL%20PROPAGANDA&wrap=2)** or **[Gloucester Bold Consensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074346/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Gloucester%20MT%20Std%20-%20Bold%20ExtCond&fid=40e0c5ba2606558004ff09a7969415d0&fsize=48&text=THE%20WORLDS%20BOGEY%20MAN%20LOCAL%20PROPAGANDA&wrap=2)**

------------------  
I found them using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018074346/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
Very much appreciated- thanks for the help!
